page.title: 01Canford Cliffs
page.content: { **A Changing Area** { We interviewed a local resident who had lived in the area for forty years. She remarked on the changes that had taken place. Trees had been cut down for housing development and recreation land. The cost of living had risen in the area because of the tourist trade and an influx of industry. Many old houses have been converted into flats and prime sites have been taken over by property developers giving way to luxury flats and warden controlled homes for the elderly. It is a prosperous area.
